code: import{useEffect,useRef}from"react";import"./HeyCosmico.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const HeyCosmico=()=>{const textRef=useRef(null);useEffect(()=>{const texts=["What's the latest research on quantum gravity?","I need to find new papers on String Theory.","Synthesize this paper for me please."];let textIndex=0;let charIndex=0;let isDeleting=false;const speed=40;const delay=1800;const type=()=>{if(!textRef.current)return;const fullText=texts[textIndex];if(isDeleting){textRef.current.textContent=fullText.substring(0,charIndex--);}else{textRef.current.textContent=fullText.substring(0,charIndex++);}if(!isDeleting&&charIndex===fullText.length){isDeleting=true;setTimeout(type,delay);}else if(isDeleting&&charIndex===0){isDeleting=false;textIndex=(textIndex+1)%texts.length;setTimeout(type,speed);}else{setTimeout(type,speed);}};type();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"heycosmico-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"heycosmico-quote-mark",children:"\u201C"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"heycosmico-title",children:"Hey Cosmico..."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"heycosmico-text",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{ref:textRef,className:"typed-text"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"blinking-cursor",children:"_"})]})]});};
